sentence.Network_en: The school presented a group of sketches instead of a long play.

sentence.Network_en: It might have lent a helping hand , although Bryant's season - long play ultimately had the final say.

sentence.Network_en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.--Carl Hubbell, Baseball Player
sentence.Network_cn: 靠过去完成的无法让人保有成功，必须在路上持续交出成绩。
